title: Cocolate Pizza Project
smltxt: Only Sweets Heaven knows the secrets...
lrgtxt: The climb to the pinical of culinary exilance is not an easy one. Rather, these hallowed halls still ring with the exclamations of delight, along with screams of horror. The Cocolate Pizza project was an attempt to break free from the gravity that binds us. The preconceived notion of our own hubrus.
points: Boldly going where those fear to tread
use of HTML and CSS vanilla to design

title: Born To Horn

No one is judging you, you can finally explore the obsession we all know you have been having.
